name: CALCOINS
body:
#CalCoins (CAL)
##THE NEW CRYPTOCURRENCY FOR THOSE OF FANS OF MY LOVELY COMIC HOMOSTUCK.

MADE BY ME CALIBORN, A TRUE ARTIST.

HERE IS MY SUBREDDIT [/R/CALCOINS_QT](https://www.reddit.com/r/CALCOINS_QT) 

***
## Overview

I'm here to offer my own altcoin clone using the name CALCOINS,  although the project will be referred to as CALCOINS_QT online to refrain from confusion. 

The wallet will be multiplatform on Windows, Mac, and PC.  And hopefully android (if this project doesn't die)

## Specs
Coincap: 41300000000 CAL

Blocktime: 30 seconds

Coins per Block: 610, 

Premine? Didn't know what it was until this moment, but seems usable and doable. 

Difficulty Adjustment? Once a day 

Does it support AuxPow? Yes it will, once the project is done. 

Are there Plans to launch a Website for this? Absolutely, I plan on moving away from GitHub for my hosting very soon, this just is for the project. 

A Mining pool? When I complete it I will see if there's interest. 

Have you talked to exchanges on supporting it? I've been looking into it, I hope to some day have it on an exchange, or provide some sort of a solution. 

## Project Information

CALCOINS
THEY WERE ALREADY HERE

Status
* Have a working test server + Genesis Block 

* Debugging (a decent amount) 

* My friend Hannah is working on the small little graphical things for the wallet program, one of my major obstacles. Her [tumblr](stay-rad-kids.tumblr.com) 

* Functioning test client, moving to dedicated hosting for the server so there aren't issues. 

_To do list_

* Finish Linux build and test with official server [x] 
    This is finished, and the server is being setup for the seed node so everyone can connect to it.
* Finish Windows and Mac builds and test

* Stress Test 

* Fix GUI and implement a negative currency system. 

***
## Notices 
I know as a fandom we've had many different attempts to start this project,  and many different stages in the projects have been reached and maybe some are done and beat me to it. But I am still going to develop and publish this. Homestuck is property of Andrew Hussie and What Pumpkin, and this project is being done under the suggestion that the fandom make the coin.

LINKS 

[THE REPO](https://www.github.com/acgh213/CALCOINS)

feel free to roll through it and if you see an issue please report it.

[Site](https://acgh213.github.io/CALCOINS)

***
 
Thank you, and feel free to send me messages about any thoughts,  comments,  or concerns

In all honesty, made my me, acgh213, and with a fork from https://github.com/natalietoday/boondollars by /u/Natalietoday on reddit and all the people attriubuted within the project (bitching,  altcoin, foocoin) I thank you for help with some of the values and helping me with the light issue I had with the timing.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
